articles.title: How the gamma-ray burst of the century surprised spacecraft operators - Space.com

articles.title: Auger-Aliassime wins European Open final for back-to-back ATP Tour titles - CBC Sports
articles.description: Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime won his second consecutive ATP tennis final after beating American Sebastian Korda 6-3, 6-4 in Sunday's final of the ATP 250 European Open in Antwerp, Belgium.
articles.content:
Canada's Felix Auger-Aliassime has been on quite a roll of late.
